website_summaries.verdict: Once Elsa’s palace is set up, kids will have a ball making tons of sparkly snowflakes, icicles, Elsa’s snow cape, and whatever else sparks their imaginations.
pros: Includes Elsa doll, Ice Palace playset, and 4 tubs of glittery Play-Doh in white, purple, blue, and white colors
Create shapes like snowflakes, magical ice effects, and little snowmen

customer_reviews.title: A Frozen playdough
customer_reviews.text: If your kids love playdough and Frozen, this is the gift to buy! It is a very decent size (I expected something smaller), Elsa is pretty big. It does take a little while for the kids to figure out how to put the castle together (with adult help). It is cute and my daughter loves playing with it (even without playdough). The ladder does come off easily and falls, but it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Yulia W.

customer_reviews.title: The ONLY thing good about it is my niece Loves the Elsa
customer_reviews.text: this thing is 100% JUNK! you have to take it completely apart to put play doh in it... The ONLY thing good about it is my niece Loves the Elsa. Not the seller's fault at all.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money! Flimsy and cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! Took much more effort than it should have to assemble because the parts would not fit smoothly together. The promise of “ snowflakes” appearing at Elsa’s feet was only a pipe dream! Whoever designed this so called “feature” missed the mark entirely! The whole thing is flimsy and poorly made. it was a complete waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: still hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Great item, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. My daughter loves the little Elsa doll the most but the whole thing is easy for her little toddler hands to play with and all the hidden snowflake makers are a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied with product
customer_reviews.text: The idea is great however the product is not so great. I'm not sure if it's a fluke and we got the bad one of the bunch but the handles are super hard to push down in order to get Elsa to spin and the playdough to come up from around her feet. The stairway will not stay connected.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was a bad choice. Got it because my daughter loves frozen. Gave it 2 stars because at the end all she used was the play doh and Elsa figure. It was difficult even for myself to figure out how the thing worked and my daughter didn’t like how complicated it was. The stairs don’t stay in place making it frustrating to make the play doh come out of the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Gee.

customer_reviews.title: Easy gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: Got a good deal on this, and you can really never go wrong with a play doh set at my house! This one is bigger than other princess ones we currently own, and I think my girls will really like the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Saffy

customer_reviews.title: Disney Frozen Play-Doh a Big Hit and a Very Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Could not have purchased anything better to keep my granddaughter both happy and entertained. I will certainly look for more items as this from this seller. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Margret N.

customer_reviews.title: Not very fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: Honestly was a bit disappointed with this toy for the price. Doesn’t really do much and the doll just seems to fall off the stage. Would have been okay for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: By far the favorite toy for Christmas. Missing one star because you have to take apart the castle to make the playdoh pop out like snow. It's a little more complicated than expected. I love the rest of the toy so easy to use for my 3yr old
customer_reviews.author: Savannah E.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter's Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Granddaughter who loves Elsa. She enjoys playing with the Ice Castle and sparkly Playdoh.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift, easy to play with and lots of fun for someone with an imagination.
customer_reviews.author: ACER

customer_reviews.title: Always happy with play doh toys!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my granddaughter. She loved it! She’s 7, now.
customer_reviews.author: Nyl55

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use and assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is almost impossible for a child to set up and push the play doh out. Ended up being a frustrating toy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Typical play dough set
customer_reviews.text: I think all play dough is overpriced and difficult to assemble. But my three granddaughters love them so I buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene J Waite

customer_reviews.title: Fun and cool 😎
customer_reviews.text: This is so much fun for kids. And the glitter play doh is so pretty. The Elsa could be used for a stamp too
customer_reviews.author: Skylar

customer_reviews.title: What little girl would not love a Frozen play doh set
customer_reviews.text: What little girl would not love a Frozen play doh set? What mother would not love picking up little crumbs of play-doh? It’s a love/hate relationship, kid loved, mother not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica herrera

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size Elsa
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size Elsa doll got Little hands. After the play doh was used up , this ELSA doll remains. And she is my 3 years olds favorite Elsa. She likes this one better then her Barbie sized Elsa. Loved the set!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Dog Walker

customer_reviews.title: She's only 3 so maybe older kids would enjoy it more
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was really excited about this Play-doh set, but she did not play with it very long because there is not much you can do with it. She's only 3 so maybe older kids would enjoy it more.
customer_reviews.author: KF15

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product was very hard to put together and does not do very much.
customer_reviews.author: Dtwhite

customer_reviews.title: She smiled the whole day.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great hit at my grand daughters 3 birthday party. She was so excited as she loves Elsa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this set
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for the granddaughter. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ffej

customer_reviews.title: Great size easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit my my 3 year old granddaughter. She could do it all herself mostly anyway
customer_reviews.author: krisley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, bought this as a Christmas gift for my four-year-old niece that is obsessed with Frozen
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Eenigenburg

customer_reviews.title: A little too much
customer_reviews.text: Meant for older girls , I'm not quite sure my 4 yr old is mature enough for this
customer_reviews.author: Ashley waddell

customer_reviews.title: Disney
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it's a great product for the price. Lots of product for a great price and its disney
customer_reviews.author: Lesli N Parris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift and it really hit the mark.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Estey

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, she plays with it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Tons of play doh and her favorite character
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Morning Gamble. :(
customer_reviews.text: Came in an open box. Had to repackage myself. Hope all the pieces are there for my sweet niece on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great you for a 4 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great my 4 year old niece really enjoyed it and at a great price too
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to use for my 3 year old to complicated
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves playing with this- we've had a fun time with Elsa.
customer_reviews.author: JenneA

customer_reviews.title: Great for Frozen fans
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves Frozen and was very excited to get this gift. It was very easy to put together and easy to use. I’m taking off 2 stars due to the fact that there’s not much to the product other than the Olaf, snows and other designs to decorate the castle. So unfortunately my daughter has only played with this a couple times and now just plays with the doll.
customer_reviews.author: JDS

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I didn't open it because it's a Christmas gift. However, it looks good & I'm confident my niece will love it. Everything was as expected & nothing seems to be damaged. I'm excited to see her face when she opens it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... gave this as a gift and the little girl loved it!
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift and the little girl loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Chief Household Mama

customer_reviews.title: She loves both frozen and play-doh so this was a great gift for her
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. She loves both frozen and play-doh so this was a great gift for her.
customer_reviews.author: Garcia

product_meta.title: Play-Doh Disney Frozen Enchanted Ice Palace Toy with Elsa Doll
product_meta.description: Inside every kid is an uninhibited explorer, a future leader, and an original creator. And inside every colorful, squishy ball of Play-Doh compound is an irresistible invitation for hands-on exploration. Coincidence? Definitely not. That's because the Play-Doh brand gives kids the power to shape their own stories in their own way, without having to worry about breaking rules or being wrong. It gives them the freedom to turn what they know into something amazing and unexpected, and there's always an adventure, masterpiece, or gigglefest waiting to happen. So take the lid off of your imagination and let the Play-Doh brand inspire you to create something awesome! Play-Doh and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro. This copy is intended as placeholder text only and is not representative of individual items in the line.
feature_bullets: Featuring Elsa from Disney's animated hit Frozen
Sculpt and play with Elsa and build her magical world with Play-Doh
Can packs and basic tool sets offer all kinds of open-ended play
Playsets come in many different themes and offer lots of creative role play
Play-Doh play lets kids take the lid off their imaginations and explore their creativity

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars136 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
